column3: when i was little, i wanted to be a veteranarian, but then i found out you had to put your hands into cows and stuff. [ross enters, depressed.]
[sullenly] hiiiiii.
are... are you ok
yeah, yeah, just a tough day at work. a stegosaurus fell over and trapped a kid. whoa, whoa, i know this jacket, this is, thfun bobbys jacket where is he, what. he, hes here, isnt he
maybe.
dont toy with me. [fun bobby fbob enters from monicas bedroom.]
geller
hey, fun bobby
hey. whoa, hey, youve been working out, huh

you and me both.

hey, do you need me to pick you up

hey no, seriously, i dont need you to pick me... [fun bobby picks joey up off the ground, bounces him. joey laughs.] alright it still works.
ok, now before i go, does anybody else need to be picked up [everyone raises their hands] im still gonna go.
ok, ill see you later babe.
uh, public display of affection coming up. you can avert your eyes. [kisses monica] [chandler and joey are watching, rachel turns their heads away from monica.]
see ya. [exits]
bye see you later
fun bobby is so great.

oh, isnt he oh, you know, i really think this time it may work with him. i mean, he just makes me feel so good and ive been feeling so lousy this last couple of months, no job, no boyfriend. well, at least my cup is half full.
half full of looooovvvvve.
and for our twoweek anniversary, hes gonna take me to his cousins cabin for the weekend.
cabin of loooooovvvvve.
we went through a lot of wine tonight, you guys. [walks over to table, holding five empty wine bottles]
really i only had two glasses.
i just had a glass.
two.
i had one glass.
i had about a mugful in this lovely i got boned at the museum of natural history mug.

oooooh.

so what. so he drank a lot tonight.
yeah but, you know, now that i think about it, i dont think ive ever seen fun bobby without a... a drink in his hand.

yeah. oh, oooh, yeah, you know, did you notice how he always starts his stories with, um, ok, i was soooo wasted, or, oh, we were soooo bombed, or, ummm, ooh, ooh, so i wake up, and im in this dumpster in connecticut.
monica, have you ever been with him when he wasnt drinking

well, we just happen to go to alot of places where you might drink. i mean, how do you go to a wine tasting without having a drink or... or to a club, or to the... zoo. them. she brings a mug to monica.]

you know what it seems like youve been making an awful lot of stuff irish lately.

bobby.
yeah, ok.
look, maybe this is none of my business, or maybe it is, i dont know... but, uh, im kind of worried about you.
ok, look, this isnt the first time somebodys said something to me about this, but, i dont know... i always made excuses about it, like... uhhh... im just a social drinker, or, cmon, its flag day.
so, what are you saying now
i guess im saying, ill try and quit. i kinda like that you worry about me. [they hug]
[comes back to couch, with cake] sooo, whats goin on, huh
i am gonna try and quit drinking.

hey.
hey.
hey.
hey.

hey rach, what time do you get off were all gonna do something tonight.

with a man

what about ross i mean, are you still mad at him cause he made that list about you
noooo, no, im not mad at him. im.. im not really anything at him anymore.

i dont know. whatever i was feeling, im... not.
but you guys came so close.

oh, i know, im sorry you guys. youre just gonna have to get used to the fact that i will not be dating ross. [russ enters central perk. he looks like ross, except for his chin and hair it is david schwimmer in a dual role.]
here he is. hi. guys, this is russ.
[sounding like ross] hhhhiiiii. [everyone looks at each other in amazement.]

stop saying youre not talented, youre very talented. its just with the bird dead and all, theres very little act left. oh, honey, give me a break, will ya [a knock on the door] oooh, ooh, ill talk to you later. [joey enters.]
well, theres my favorite client. so tell me darling, how was the audition

ok, uh.... listen, theres something i want to talk to you about. the network casting lady...
oh, isnt lori a doll

hi.

alright.

well, yeah, this is the deal.
ok, well, um, have a nice evening.
um, russ, you ready
yeah.

hey
